CustomField.formula: Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c-( CASE( MOD(Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, (Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c) + Estimated_Project_Duration__c + FLOOR((Estimated_Project_Duration__c-1)/5)*2, 1, (Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c) + Estimated_Project_Duration__c + FLOOR((Estimated_Project_Duration__c)/5)*2, 2, (Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c) + Estimated_Project_Duration__c + FLOOR((Estimated_Project_Duration__c+1)/5)*2, 3, (Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c) + Estimated_Project_Duration__c + FLOOR((Estimated_Project_Duration__c+2)/5)*2, 4, (Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c) + Estimated_Project_Duration__c + FLOOR((Estimated_Project_Duration__c+3)/5)*2, 5, (Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c) + Estimated_Project_Duration__c + CEILING((Estimated_Project_Duration__c)/5)*2, 6, (Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c) - IF(Estimated_Project_Duration__c>0,1,0) + Estimated_Project_Duration__c + CEILING((Estimated_Project_Duration__c)/5)*2, null ) - Scheduled_Tactic_Start__c )
CustomField.label: Latest Project Start
